item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: themeton
item.content:encoded:
[blox_row fullwidth="true" image="http://demo.themeton.com/flatter/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2014/01/video-overlay.png" bg_repeat="repeat" bg_position="left top" bg_attach="scroll" text_light="1" video_active="1" video_m4v="http://demo.themeton.com/flatter/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2014/01/pagebuilder-screen.m4v" video_webm="http://demo.themeton.com/flatter/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2014/01/Big_Buck_Bunny_Trailer.webm" poster="http://demo.themeton.com/flatter/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2014/01/flat_icons_set_Converted.png" padding_top="200" padding_bottom="0" overlay_color="#000000" overlay_opacity=".9"][blox_column width="1/1"][blox_text animation="fadeInUp"]

We Are Creative Theme Development Team from Mongolia

[/blox_text][blox_divider type="space" space="50"/][blox_image image="http://demo.themeton.com/flatter/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2014/01/flat-devices.png" img_width="600" alignment="center" target="0" animation="fadeInUp"][/blox_image][/blox_column][/blox_row][blox_row text_light="0" padding_top="100" padding_bottom="100"][blox_column width="1/1"][blox_text animation="fadeInUp"]

Our passion for what we do transfers into our services

Dynamically synthesize transparent synergy vis-a-vis premier information. Interactively supply parallel users before virtual human capital. Efficiently productize technically sound outsourcing and emerging methods of empowerment.

item.title: Eine
item.dc:creator: themeton
item.content:encoded: [blox_row][blox_column width="1/1"][blox_text animation="none"] London based agency Root have created an identity and stationery set for Eine – awesome print finishing and a beautiful simple concept. See more of their work here.   [/blox_text][blox_row_inner columns="1/2+1/2"][blox_column_inner width="1/2"][blox_text animation="none"] [/blox_text][/blox_column_inner][blox_column_inner width="1/2"][blox_text animation="none"] [/blox_text][/blox_column_inner][/blox_row_inner][/blox_column][/blox_row]

item.title: Colors Collector
item.dc:creator: themeton
item.content:encoded: [blox_row][blox_column width="1/1"][blox_text animation="none"] Collector is a special issue of COLORS Magazine dedicated to people who regroup and catalogue objects linked to a theme, For the 20th anniversary of COLORS, Collector, celebrates the diversity of cultures, by bringing a contemporary vision of products from different media, such as graphic design, industrial design, sound and even nature. Art direction by Magdalena Czarnecki.   [/blox_text][blox_row_inner columns="1/6+1/6+1/6+1/6+1/6+1/6"][blox_column_inner width="1/6"][blox_text animation="none"]   [/blox_text][/blox_column_inner][blox_column_inner width="1/6"][blox_text animation="none"]   [/blox_text][/blox_column_inner][blox_column_inner width="1/6"][blox_text animation="none"]   [/blox_text][/blox_column_inner][blox_column_inner width="1/6"][blox_text animation="none"]   [/blox_text][/blox_column_inner][blox_column_inner width="1/6"][blox_text animation="none"] [/blox_text][/blox_column_inner][blox_column_inner width="1/6"][blox_text animation="none"]   [/blox_text][/blox_column_inner][/blox_row_inner][/blox_column][/blox_row]

item.title: Turbine
item.dc:creator: themeton
item.content:encoded: [blox_row][blox_column width="1/1"][blox_text animation="none"] The ‘Turbine’ is the new creative hotspot in Leiden (The Netherlands) that promotes cooperation between young entrepreneurs. Recently the ‘Turbine’ was opened during a festival in the ‘House of Communication’. Studio ÜberDutch and Renée Schuffelers Id. were responsible for the unique design of the space. Graphic design agency Duel created the visual Identity, photography by Maarten Fleskens.   [/blox_text][/blox_column][/blox_row][blox_row columns="1/2+1/2"][blox_column width="1/2"][blox_text animation="none"] [/blox_text][/blox_column][blox_column width="1/2"][blox_text animation="none"] [/blox_text][/blox_column][/blox_row]

item.title: Xavier Encinas
item.dc:creator: themeton
item.content:encoded: Xavier Encinas has a new site up, with some cracking new work.

item.title: D&AD Awards
item.dc:creator: themeton
item.content:encoded: The D&AD Awards tickets, designed by NB:Studio and produced by Generation Press. Via the Grafikcache.

item.title: A Friend of Mine
item.dc:creator: themeton
item.content:encoded: [blox_row][blox_column width="1/1"][blox_text animation="none"] Some nice updates from AFOM. via Grafikcache.   [/blox_text][blox_row_inner columns="1/2+1/2"][blox_column_inner width="1/2"][blox_text animation="none"] [/blox_text][/blox_column_inner][blox_column_inner width="1/2"][blox_text animation="none"] [/blox_text][/blox_column_inner][/blox_row_inner][/blox_column][/blox_row]

item.title: Soleil Noir
item.dc:creator: themeton
item.content:encoded: [blox_row][blox_column width="1/1"][blox_text animation="none"] Some more great work by Mr. Xavier Encinas – lovely job sir! Print Finishes: Plike Black 330gsm Fedregoni Splendorlux Black Glossy 240gsm Century Premium White 100gsm Litho’d Offset black Foil Stamp Die Cuts Deboss Typeface: VAG Rounded   [/blox_text][blox_row_inner columns="1/2+1/2"][blox_column_inner width="1/2"][blox_text animation="none"]   [/blox_text][/blox_column_inner][blox_column_inner width="1/2"][blox_text animation="none"]   [/blox_text][/blox_column_inner][/blox_row_inner][/blox_column][/blox_row]

item.title: Wood Type Helvetica
item.dc:creator: themeton
item.content:encoded: Helvetica wood type Idea & photography by Kim Høltermand. Woodcarving by Ole Meyersahm. via typography served

item.title: Golden Moments
item.dc:creator: themeton
item.content:encoded: September Industry put up a stunning post this month. A sampler from the elusive Golden. Do take a look and if anyone knows where I can get a copy of the book, please let me know.

item.title: Meneo

item.content:encoded: A nice selection of work from Bilboa based designers Meneo
